title: Introduction to R and Python
description:
This post serves as a discussion board for the first tab
in the ML4PP course: Introduction to R and Python and, of course,
a general welcome to the course.
contents:
Overview
We know starting a new programming language can be challenging. Hopefully, you were able to follow the brief R and Python introductions. If you found difficulties, feel free to leave a message here.
